meanings.definition: A computer program used for organizing and analyzing data in rows and columns.
meanings.sent1: I use spreadsheets to keep track of my monthly expenses.
meanings.sent2: She opened the spreadsheets to review the sales data.
meanings.sent3: The spreadsheets decided to have a party and invite all the data cells.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like spreadsheets, neatly categorizing every detail.
meanings.sent5: The spreadsheets glowed on the screen, revealing patterns in the numbers.

meanings.definition: A document or file created using a spreadsheet program.
meanings.sent1: The spreadsheets on his computer contained important financial information.
meanings.sent2: Please email me the spreadsheets with the updated budget figures.
meanings.sent3: The spreadsheets were feeling rebellious and refused to save any changes.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas flowed seamlessly into the spreadsheets, creating a clear picture.
meanings.sent5: The spreadsheets printed out beautifully, ready for the meeting presentation.
